title: Fix the title text font weight on the default page templates.
body: In WP8, the default Pivot control  now correctly displays the title text at the top of the page with the PhoneFontFamilySemiBold and PhoneFontSizeMedium styles, but the standard "blank" page template still uses PhoneTextNormalStyle (which uses the normal font weight and a slightly smaller size) for the page title.
